text: avar bhūmiyil sañcaricc avaruṭe mumpuṇṭāyirunnavaruṭe antyaṁ evvidhamāyirunnuvenn nēākki manas'silākkiyiṭṭillē? avar ivarekkāḷ aṅgabalamuḷḷavarāyirunnu. karuttukeāṇṭuṁ bhūmiyil śēṣippicca paitr̥kaṁ keāṇṭuṁ kūṭutal prabalarāyirunnu. enniṭṭuṁ avar sampādiccukeāṇṭirunnateānnuṁ avarkk upakariccilla
